entities.name: harper
entities.description: Harper is a person who is participating in a game. He is described as having his hand outstretched and being feet from the Snitch.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is participating in a game. He is described as yelling at Harper and catching the Snitch.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a person who is mentioned by Harry, implying that he was supposed to participate in the game instead of Harper.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is a person who is participating in the game. She is described as speeding past Harry and the rest of the team.

relationships.description: Harry implies that Malfoy paid Harper to come on instead of him, suggesting a financial transaction between Malfoy and Harper.
Harper and Harry interact with each other during the game, with Harper fumbling the Snitch and Harry catching it.
